title: Russian Chess Robot Breaks Child's Finger At Moscow Open
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 Rounds in the magazine ... Round #1: It’s finally happening, the robots have begun to attack… but you don’t have anything to worry about if you don’t play chess. In mother russia, chess robot checks you, mate Round #2: Some of our nation’s most high-speed soldiers are facing a huge problem… They can’t find a good daycare. And the issue is so dire even congress members are getting involved Round #3: A terrible story out of Hawaii where a Marine is accused of murdering his spouse on the side of a highway. Making major waves across military social media pages. Round #4 Space tourism is almost upon us & so we must warn you now - do NOT wack off up there. SUPPORT OUR SHOW!
